DOC.brief_summary: Study to assess the efficacy of a modified Pathways curriculum in treating depressive symptoms in women with physical disabilities.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Pathways Curriculum for Use With WPD
DOC.criteria: Women with physical disability requiring accommodation for major mobility limitations CESD score of 16 or higher Active suicidality Diagnosis of Schizophrenia, Schizoaffective D/O, Psychosis NOS Currently receiving other psychotherapy
